channel.title: CVE Feed for Gemalto -- Gemalto's HASP SRM, Sentinel HASP and Sentinel LDK products prior to Sentinel LDK RTE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gemalto -- Gemalto's HASP SRM, Sentinel HASP and Sentinel LDK products prior to Sentinel LDK RTE

item.title: CVE-2017-12821|2024-08-05T18:51:06.280Z -- gemalto -- gemalto%27s%20hasp%20srm%2C%20sentinel%20hasp%20and%20sentinel%20ldk%20products%20prior%20to%20sentinel%20ldk%20rte
item.description: Memory corruption in Gemalto's HASP SRM, Sentinel HASP and Sentinel LDK products prior to Sentinel LDK RTE version 7.55 might cause remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-12820|2024-08-05T18:51:07.223Z -- gemalto -- gemalto%27s%20hasp%20srm%2C%20sentinel%20hasp%20and%20sentinel%20ldk%20products%20prior%20to%20sentinel%20ldk%20rte
item.description: Arbitrary memory read from controlled memory pointer in Gemalto's HASP SRM, Sentinel HASP and Sentinel LDK products prior to Sentinel LDK RTE version 7.55 leads to remote denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2017-12822|2024-08-05T18:51:06.261Z -- gemalto -- gemalto%27s%20hasp%20srm%2C%20sentinel%20hasp%20and%20sentinel%20ldk%20products%20prior%20to%20sentinel%20ldk%20rte
item.description: Remote enabling and disabling admin interface in Gemalto's HASP SRM, Sentinel HASP and Sentinel LDK products prior to Sentinel LDK RTE version 7.55 leads to new attack vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-12818|2024-08-05T18:51:06.201Z -- gemalto -- gemalto%27s%20hasp%20srm%2C%20sentinel%20hasp%20and%20sentinel%20ldk%20products%20prior%20to%20sentinel%20ldk%20rte
item.description: Stack overflow in custom XML-parser in Gemalto's HASP SRM, Sentinel HASP and Sentinel LDK products prior to Sentinel LDK RTE version 7.55 leads to remote denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2017-12819|2024-08-05T18:51:06.849Z -- gemalto -- gemalto%27s%20hasp%20srm%2C%20sentinel%20hasp%20and%20sentinel%20ldk%20products%20prior%20to%20sentinel%20ldk%20rte
item.description: Remote manipulations with language pack updater lead to NTLM-relay attack for system user in Gemalto's HASP SRM, Sentinel HASP and Sentinel LDK products prior to Sentinel LDK RTE version 7.55.
